strings:
<voice_0x010011E6><se_high><center>I am Alexandra.
<center>Many years past I lived in your world.
<center>It was my hands that sculpted this statue.

<voice_0x010011E7><se_high><center>Let me tell you a tale. A forgotten moment
<center>lost in the great ocean of history.
<center>The story of the bloodline of the sages...

<voice_0x010011E8><se_high><center>I was born into the Kranbartle family,
<center>a family descended from one of
<center>the legendary seven sages.

<voice_0x010011E9><se_high><center>But my generation saw the legacy of the sages
<center>pass to the Albert family when I married.
<center>You see, I was the chosen heir.

<voice_0x010011EA><se_high><center>The blood of the sages has remained
<center>in the Albert family ever since.

<voice_0x010011EB><se_high><center>But that lineage was severed by a dark and evil
<center>power when the life of the latest chosen heir,
<center>Alistair, was ended...

<voice_0x010011EC><se_high><center>Nevertheless, I am an ancestor of
<center>the Albert family.

<voice_0x010011ED><se_high><center>So I will do everything I can to help
<center>preserve the Albert family line.

<voice_0x010011EE><se_high><center>I want you to take the Kran Spinels
<center>from the statue. I have no doubt they
<center>will be of use to you.

<voice_0x010011EF><se_high><center>Now Jessica is the only one who
<center>can continue the Albert family line.
<center>I beseech you to go to her aid.
